attributes.action: Reject all petitions which have words spelled incorrectly.
attributes.additional_details:
There is no excuse in this day and age for there to be spelling mistakes. Children are taught from the age of 4 - 16 compulsory and to 18 by choice.

There is absolutely zero reason why someone with the intelligence to put up an e-petition should spell a word wrong.

Please reject all poorly worded e-petitions for the good of the nation's grammar.
